title: If you could live in Cyberpunk 2077, would you? - Quora

response.answer_text: No way, dude. Even if I’m guaranteed a cushy well-paid corporate job I can easily see myself devolving into Patrick Bateman from “American Psycho” out of sheer boredom.  All the other options are worse - slave away at some factory, office or farm, or be a hobo without even a shotgun to your name. Either way, life is likely to be nasty, brutish, and short. I’ll stay where I am, thanks.

Heck no, I used to play the Cyberpunk 2020 RPG that 2077 is based on. I like my Empathy score just were it is Cyberphycosis is not a fun condition to have. I’d either be living in Beaverville with the other corporate drones or more probably on the street or dead.
